revised_title: Supplement to Two Papers: Further Analysis and Improvements on Human Mortality and Life Contingencies
tldr: This supplement to two previous papers on human mortality and life contingencies by Benjamin Gompertz introduces new improvements and further analysis. It discusses the limitations of previous formulas and introduces new theories for calculating annuities and handling special, single, and specially influenced contingencies. Additionally, it presents a theory of sickness that closely resembles actual statements of sickness among Friendly Societies.
